data.name: Mutagenic
data.detailed_description:
You are a lonely hero, spawned into a brutal world occupied by countless hostile creatures. Mutagenic is a hardcore roguelite action game, where every choice matters.

Key Features

  • Unique Playstyles With multiple characters and skills to choose from, there is a playstyle for everyone.

  • Build Diversity A diverse set of items, skills, and mutations all allow unique interactions and plenty of opportunity for build customization.

  • Replayability Every time you spawn a new mutated hero, your path forward will be different. Learn, adapt, and conquer the foes that await you. Great treasure awaits only the strongest of heros.

  • Powerful Loot Find modifications to skills and items which can turn you from a hero into a god.
data.about_the_game:
You are a lonely hero, spawned into a brutal world occupied by countless hostile creatures. Mutagenic is a hardcore roguelite action game, where every choice matters.

Key Features

data.short_description: Mutagenic is an upcoming rogue-lite with simple controls, yet engaging mechanics. The rules are simple: mutate, kill, collect, unlock, die. Repeat. Kill monsters, collect mutagen, spend mutagen to upgrade characters. Mutagen is not permanent, how will you spend it?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1/Windows 8
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.5GHz x86_64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL GLES 3 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1/Windows 8
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.7GHz x86_64
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL GLES 3 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
